title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1271/97 of 1 July 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2219/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the specific supply arrangements for Madeira relating to milk products and establishing the forecast supply balance
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1271/97 of 1 July 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2219/92 laying down detailed rules for the application of the specific supply arrangements for Madeira relating to milk products and establishing the forecast supply balance
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2219/92 is replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 320, 11. 12. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 179, 1. 7. 1992, p. 6.
(4) OJ No L 238, 23. 9. 1993, p. 24.
(5) OJ No L 218, 1. 8. 1992, p. 75.
(6) OJ No L 124, 16. 5. 1997, p. 10.
ANNEX
'ANNEX I
Forecast supply balance for Madeira relating to milk products for the period 1 July to 31 December 1997
